Module
PE Adder Tree (mvu_pe_adders.​sv)

Author(s): Syed Asad Alam syed.as[xxx]ad.alam@tcd[xxx].ie

This file lists an RTL implementation of an adder unit which adds the output of the SIMD units. Starting off as a simple adder tree.  It is part of a processing element which is part of the Matrix-Vector-Multiplication Unit

This material is based upon work supported, in part, by Science Foundation Ireland, www.sfi.ie under Grant No. 13/RC/2094 and, in part, by the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under the Marie Sklodowska-Curie grant agreement Grant No.754489.

Inputs
aclk

Main clock

aresetn

Synchronous and active low reset *

[TDstI-1:0] in_simd [0:SIMD-1]

Input from the SIMD unit, word length TDstI

Outputs
[TDstI-1:0] out_add

Output from adder, word length TDstI

Signals
out_add_int

Internal signal holding the combinatorial output of adder tree

Combinatorial Always Blocks
Addition

Performs addition using adder tree

Sequential Always Blocks
OUT_REG

Registered output
